response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the clothes dryer without any errors. The next step is to open the clothes dryer.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the clothes dryer.
(2) Open the clothes dryer.
(3) Take out a bath towel from the clothes dryer.
(4) Fold the bath towel.
(5) Move the robot to the hamper.
(6) Put the folded bath towel into the hamper.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Open the clothes dryer.
    clothes_dryer = registry(env, "clothes_dryer_zlmnfg_0")
    open(robot, clothes_dryer)
    donothing(env)
